sceneDescription.title: Doctor Livesey and Squire Trelawney Examine the Map

setting.location: Squire Trelawney's study, country manor, Devon
setting.weather: Sunny day visible through tall windows

characters.appearance: Distinguished doctor, 40s, intelligent eyes, neat appearance
characters.clothing: Black coat, white cravat, powdered wig

characters.appearance: Portly squire, 50s, red face, excited expression
characters.clothing: Fine velvet coat, embroidered waistcoat, dress wig

scene.mainElements: Elegant study with two gentlemen discovering treasure map's secrets, boy watching as adventure plans form
scene.details: Large mahogany desk covered with papers, leather-bound books lining walls, globe in corner, yellowed treasure map spread on desk showing island with red X marks, inkwell and quills, afternoon light streaming through windows illuminating dust motes
scene.background: Floor-to-ceiling bookshelves, portrait paintings, view of manicured gardens through windows
scene.atmosphere: Excitement of discovery, scholarly investigation mixed with boyish adventure dreams, respectable setting contrasting with pirate treasure

composition.cameraAngle: High angle showing desk and all three figures
composition.focus: The treasure map spread on desk with hands pointing
composition.depth: Map and hands in sharp foreground, three figures arranged around desk middle ground, elegant room details background
